title: Bona. For Simply Beautiful Floors - So You Can Take Care of More Important Things
description: Love your floors with water based solutions from Bona, safe for you and our planet. Simple steps for a daily clean, a timeless shine, and a lifetime of protection. Bona. For Simply Beautiful Floors.

asset.author: Bona
asset.description: Love your floors with water based solutions from Bona, safe for you and our planet. Simple steps for a daily clean, a timeless shine, and a lifetime of protection. Bona. For Simply Beautiful Floors.

transcripts: (Come on, come on, come on) Bona makes it easy to care for your hardwood floors so you can take care of more important things. Bona water-based solution safe for you and our planet for a daily clean, a timeless shine in a lifetime of protection. Win a Bona prize pack share a photo of simple moments on your floor at hashtag my simple moments.
